sentences.en: A really good catalogue can also whet customers' appetites for merchandise.
sentences.cn: 一份真正好的商品目录也可以激起顾客购买的欲望。

sentences.en: Companions, the creator seeketh, and such as know how to whet their sickles.
sentences.cn: 开创者找寻的是伙伴，是那些懂得如何磨快镰刀的人。

sentences.en: He may whet his knife on the threshold of the Fleet.
However, suffering and overwhelmed tiemuzhen, on the contrary, but he will whet.
sentences.cn: 然而, 苦难并无把铁木真压垮, 相反却磨练了他的意志.

sentences.en: I inquireed of him whet her he liked it.
If ox falls, whet your knife.
sentences.cn: 牛一倒, 快磨刀;人遭难,众人踩.

sentences.en: If the ox falls , whet your knife.
Once in a while we whet to a restaurant.
Read what he have to say and see whet IT you agree.
sentences.cn: 读一读他的观点,看看你也许同意.

sentences.en: She gave him just enough information to whet his appetite.
sentences.cn: 她向他透露的信息刚好能吊起他的胃口。

sentences.en: Stones whet a sword, difficulties strengthen willpower.
sentences.cn: 石头是刀的朋友, 障碍是意志的朋友.

sentences.en: The book will whet your appetite for more of her work.
sentences.cn: 你看了这本书就会更想多读她的著作。

sentences.en: The dish will whet your appetite.
sentences.cn: 这盘菜能促进你的食欲.

sentences.en: The teacher is a whet - stone and student a knife.
sentences.cn: 老师是块磨刀石,学生是刀.

sentences.en: They wondered whet the manager would not agree to the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 她们心里拿不定主意也许经理不会同意这项意见.

sentences.en: Your reply quite overdue whet prevent you.
sentences.cn: 你方回在电太迟,是何原因.

trans.tran_cn: 磨, 磨快, 使兴奋
trans.tran_en: to make the edge of a blade sharp

trans.tran_cn: （在石头上）磨（刀、斧等），引起，刺激（食欲、欲望、兴趣等）
